name: Space-Stricken Love
description:
Ludum Dare 42 submission. The theme was "running out of space".

Extra Credit Game Jam submission. The theme was "awesome per second".

I tried to make a new game for the EC Jam, but I wasn't satisfied with it, so I submitted this. Technically I'm not allowed to, though.

Use the Arrow Keys to move and the Spacebar to jump.
